title: Advanced Regression Methods
description: This course will introduce advanced biostatistical methods including: meta-analysis, smoothing, Poisson and negative binomial regression, ordinal and nominal logistic regression, propensity score analysis, and analysis of time-to-event data with competing risks. Corequisite: CLRE 254. Prerequisites: CLRE 253, admission to the MAS in Clinical Research Program, or consent of department.
